title: Supply and Installation of Solar Panels for Municipal Buildings
description: Seeking qualified contractors to supply and install photovoltaic solar panels on multiple municipal buildings to enhance renewable energy usage and reduce carbon footprint. The project includes maintenance services for a period of 5 years.

title: Construction of New Public Library Facility
description: Invitation to tender for the construction of a modern public library, including architectural design, civil engineering, and interior fit-out. The building should meet green building standards and be accessible to all citizens.
